short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage and copy GIFs across websites with ease

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right click on any GIF > Copy
Click on extension icon > Click on GIF to add to website automatically
Favourite and delete GIFs from manager for quick access
